entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
